text: Adam Walker (born 1 April 1969) is the leader of the British National Party. He was elected on 27 July 2015. ==Elections contested== UK Parliament elections Date of election Constituency Party Votes % votes 2010 Bishop Auckland BNP 2,036 4.9 2015 Rotherham BNP 225 0.6 2017 Bishop Auckland BNP 991 2.3"Election 2017: Bishop Auckland", BBC News. title: Adam Walker
